attributes.action: Killer drivers could avoid jail- What Planet is the Labour Party On!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Drivers that kill can avoid jail. STOP! Labour will be out out Government if it comes up with rubbish ideas like this.  All incidents involving deaths on the highway are all avoidable. Someone is responsible so the punishment should fit the crime. Not reward them with community service-stop being too lenient harsher sentences is what Britain needs.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
